Room.Name: A wet and damp trail
Room.Description: Outside of the city begins a highly undeveloped walkway which leads from the city into the southern swamps. Before this primitive path was built, there was absolutely no way into the putrid quagmire. Now the public can journey into this new found land at their leisure.

Room.Name: A wet and damp trail
Room.Description: As you venture deeper into the swamps, you notice that this recently built pathway is slowly being overcome with stagnant water and swamp grass. The smell of the area is foul enough to make a man's stomach turn sour. You notice a yellow tinge to the muck surrounding the path, as well as the constant buzz of mosquitoes and dragonflies.

Room.Name: A wet and damp trail
Room.Description: As you venture deeper into the swamps, you notice that this recently built pathway is slowly being overcome with stagnant water and swamp grass. The smell of the area is foul enough to make a man's stomach turn sour. You notice a yellow tinge to the muck surrounding the path, as well as the constant buzz of mosquitoes and dragonflies.

Room.Name: A wet and damp trail
Room.Description: As you venture deeper into the swamps, you notice that this recently built pathway is slowly being overcome with stagnant water and swamp grass. The smell of the area is foul enough to make a man's stomach turn sour. You notice a yellow tinge to the muck surrounding the path, as well as the constant buzz of mosquitoes and dragonflies.

Room.Name: A wet and damp trail
Room.Description: As you venture deeper into the swamps, you notice that this recently built pathway is slowly being overcome with stagnant water and swamp grass. The smell of the area is foul enough to make a man's stomach turn sour. You notice a yellow tinge to the muck surrounding the path, as well as the constant buzz of mosquitoes and dragonflies. You see that in order for you to continue you must make a turn towards the west to stay on the trail.

Room.Name: A wet and damp trail
Room.Description: As you venture deeper into the swamps, you notice that this recently built pathway is slowly being overcome with stagnant water and swamp grass. The smell of the area is foul enough to make a man's stomach turn sour. You notice a yellow tinge to the muck surrounding the path, as well as the constant buzz of mosquitoes and dragonflies.

Room.Description: As you venture deeper into the swamps, you notice that this recently built pathway is slowly being overcome with stagnant water and swamp grass. The smell of the area is foul enough to make a man's stomach turn sour. You notice a yellow tinge to the muck surrounding the path, as well as the constant buzz of mosquitoes and dragonflies.

Room.Description: As you venture deeper into the swamps, you notice that this recently built pathway is slowly being overcome with stagnant water and swamp grass. Room.Description: As you venture deeper into the swamps, you notice that this recently built pathway is slowly being overcome with stagnant water and swamp grass. Room.Name: A wet and damp trail
Room.Description: As you venture deeper into the swamps, you notice that this recently built pathway is slowly being overcome with stagnant water and swamp grass. The smell of the area is foul enough to make a man's stomach turn sour. You notice a yellow tinge to the muck surrounding the path, as well as the constant buzz of mosquitoes and dragonflies.

Room.Name: In the southern swamps
Room.Description: Here you can see that the pathway made from Arkham is just barely apparent. The swamp was too much for the structure of the path and all there is to walk upon are large rocks placed in a line allowing you to go west, east and south. The stench is more pungent and you can barely see any signs that society once had an influence here.

Room.Name: In the southern swamps
Room.Description: Here you can see that the pathway made from Arkham is just barely apparent. The swamp was too much for the structure of the path and all there is to walk upon are large rocks placed in a line allowing you to go east. The stench is more pungent and you can barely see any signs that society once had its influence here.

Room.Name: In the southern swamps
Room.Description: Here you can see that the pathway made from Arkham is just barely apparent. The swamp was too much for the structure of the path and all there is to walk upon are large rocks placed in a line allowing you to go west, east and south. The stench is almost unbearable here, nearly causing you to vomit.

Room.Name: in the southern swamps
Room.Description: Here you can see that the pathway made from Arkham is just barely apparent. The swamp was too much for the structure of the path and all there is to walk upon are large rocks placed in a line allowing you to go west, east and south. The stench is almost unbearable here, nearly causing you to vomit.

Room.Name: In the southern swamps
Room.Description: Here you can see that the pathway made from Arkham is just barely apparent. The swamp was too much for the structure of the path and all there is to walk upon are large rocks placed in a line allowing you to go west or north. The stench is almost unbearable here, nearly causing you to vomit.

Room.Name: In the southern swamps
Room.Description: Here you can see that the pathway made from Arkham is just barely apparent. The swamp was too much for the structure of the path and all there is to walk upon are large rocks placed in a line allowing you to go south or east. The stench is almost unbearable here, nearly causing you to vomit. You see an old shack off in the distance.

Room.Name: An old shack
Room.Description: Surprisingly enough, it looks as if an old man has found peace in a part of this swamp. He has managed to lay a foundation to an old decrepit shack on top of a mound of what seems to be stable earth. Even the insects of the swamp seem to be less frequent here.

Room.Name: In the southern swamps
Room.Description: Here you can see that the pathway made from Arkham is just barely apparent. The swamp was too much for the structure of the path and all there is to walk upon are large rocks placed in a line allowing you to go north and south. The stench is more pungent and you can barely see any signs that society once had an influence here.

Room.Name: In the southern swamps
Room.Description: Here you can see that the pathway made from Arkham is just barely apparent. The swamp was too much for the structure of the path and all there is to walk upon are large rocks placed in a line allowing you to go north and south. The stench is more pungent and you can barely see any signs that society once had an influence here.

Room.Name: In the southern swamps
Room.Description: Here you can see that the pathway made from Arkham is just barely apparent. The swamp was too much for the structure of the path and all there is to walk upon are large rocks scattered around, allowing limited movement. The stench is more pungent and you can barely see any signs that society once had an influence here.

Room.Name: In the southern swamps
Room.Description: Here you can see that the pathway made from Arkham is just barely apparent. Room.Name: A small landing
Room.Description: This looks to be a slightly solid piece of marsh land. As you look around yourself, there is not much light being let in through the thick swamp gas and overwhelming vegetation. You look to the south and see that darkness is all you can see with the occassional stream of sun light peeking through the trees.

Room.Name: Deep in the quagmire
Room.Description: You are now in the deepest part of the swamp. The stench is thicker and more putrid than ever. With only the smallest streams of sunlight peaking through the tree line above, you can see large mudholes seeping out the gas, causing the stench. Vegetation is abnormally large and almost life like to the point of seeing some of the plants actually move in your direction.

Room.Name: Deep in the quagmire
Room.Description: You are now in the deepest part of the swamp. The stench is thicker and more putrid than ever. With only the smallest streams of sunlight peaking through the tree line above, you can see large mudholes seeping out the gas, causing the stench. Vegetation is abnormally large and almost life like to the point of seeing some of the plants actually move in your direction.

Room.Name: Deep in the quagmire
Room.Description: You are now in the deepest part of the swamp. The stench is thicker and more putrid than ever. With only the smallest streams of sunlight peaking through the tree line above, you can see large mudholes seeping out the gas, causing the stench. Vegetation is abnormally large and almost life like to the point of seeing some of the plants actually move in your direction.

Room.Name: Through the brambles and weeds
Room.Description: After passing through a wall of weeds and thorns to the west, you find yourself on a secluded section of the swamp. The plants around you form a type of wall, a shelter, keeping most of the insects out. Looking around you see that there is a way to the south.

Room.Name: Through the brambles and weeds
Room.Description: The shelter that seemed to be forming in the north no longer is apparent here. Now, the plants and trees part, opening up to a large, open area. Beautiful flowers of all types seem to blossom as you watch them. The scent from the flowers cover up the normal stench of the swamp, making it almost bearable to stay here. To the south, you see one very large plant.

Room.Name: In the thicket
Room.Description: You come to the end of a grove in the middle of the swamp. Here, a large and hungry venus fly trap has decided to make its home and you have now disturbed it. From the fluids coming from his huge plant mouth, you are almost certain its time for him to feed.

Room.Name: A quiet place in the swamp
Room.Description: This part of the swamp is different than the majority of it. You see here the same plant life, marsh gas, insects, and darkness, but it is very calm and peaceful. As you scan around the place you see that the plants beneath your feet seem to bind together, allowing you to continue deeper into the swamp.

Room.Name: A quiet place in the swamp
Room.Description: This part of the swamp is different than the majority of it. You see here the same plant life, marsh gas, insects, and darkness, but it is very calm and peaceful. As you scan around the place you see that the plants beneath your feet seem to bind together, allowing you to continue deeper into the swamp.

Room.Name: A quiet place in the swamp
Room.Description: This part of the swamp is different than the majority of it. You see here the same plant life, marsh gas, insects, and darkness, but it is very calm and peaceful. As you scan around the place you see that the plants beneath your feet seem to bind together, allowing you to continue deeper into the swamp.

As you scan around the place you see that the plants beneath your feet seem to bind together, allowing you to continue deeper into the swamp.

Room.Name: A quiet place in the swamp
Room.Description: This part of the swamp is different than the majority of it. You see here the same plant life, marsh gas, insects, and darkness, but it is very calm and peaceful. Room.Name: A quiet place in the swamp
Room.Description: This part of the swamp is different than the majority of it. You see here the same plant life, marsh gas, insects, and darkness, but it is very calm and peaceful. As you scan around the place you see that the plants beneath your feet seem to bind together, allowing you to continue deeper into the swamp.

Room.Name: A quiet place in the swamp
Room.Description: This part of the swamp is different than the majority of it. You see here the same plant life, marsh gas, insects, and darkness, but it is very calm and peaceful. As you scan around the place you see that the plants beneath your feet seem to bind together, allowing you to continue deeper into the swamp.

Room.Name: A Rise of Bald and Sloping Tracks
Room.Description: The slope leading up to the top of the volcano is treacherous, covered in rough and jagged rocks that make every step a potential misstep. The air is thick with the scent of sulfur and ash, and the heat from the volcano's molten core radiates off the rocks, making it almost unbearable to touch. The path itself is narrow and winding, with steep drops on either side that lead down into the fiery depths below. At the top of the slope, the volcano's caldera looms large, a gaping maw that seems to swallow the sky whole.

Room.Name: A Rise of Bald and Sloping Tracks
Room.Description: The slope leading up to the top of the volcano is treacherous, covered in rough and jagged rocks that make every step a potential misstep. The air is thick with the scent of sulfur and ash, and the heat from the volcano's molten core radiates off the rocks, making it almost unbearable to touch. The path itself is narrow and winding, with steep drops on either side that lead down into the fiery depths below. At the top of the slope, the volcano's caldera looms large, a gaping maw that seems to swallow the sky whole.

Room.Name: A worn away path in the swamps
Room.Description: Deeper into the swamps you can see that some of the inhabitants have managed to somewhat make a path through its center. Even the smell is a little more tolerable due to the wild flowers growing along both sides of the path. The insects, however, frequent these flowers, and have managed to practically swarm the air around you.

Room.Name: A worn away path in the swamps

Room.Description: You are now in the deepest part of the swamp. The stench is thicker and more putrid than ever. With only the smallest streams of sunlight peaking through the tree line above, you can see large mudholes seeping out the gas, causing the stench. Vegetation is abnormally large and almost life like to the point of seeing some of the plants actually move in your direction.

Vegetation is abnormally large and almost life like to the point of seeing some of the plants actually move in your direction.

Room.Name: In the depths of the swamp
Room.Description: At this point, you are almost convinced you are lost. Looking around yourself, you see nothing but darkness with an occasional reflection of sunlight off the murky bog water. Though you can no longer see the inhabitants of the swamp, you are sure they are there from the constant buzzing and clicking noises.

Room.Name: In the depths of the swamp
Room.Description: At this point, you are almost convinced you are lost. Looking around yourself, you see nothing but darkness with an occasional reflection of sunlight off the murky bog water. Though you can no longer see the inhabitants of the swamp, you are sure they are there from the constant buzzing and clicking noises.

Room.Name: In the depths of the swamp
Room.Description: At this point, you are almost convinced you are lost. Looking around yourself, you see nothing but darkness with an occasional reflection of sunlight off the murky bog water. Though you can no longer see the inhabitants of the swamp, you are sure they are there from the constant buzzing and clicking noises.

Room.Name: Deep in the quagmire
Room.Description: You are now in the deepest part of the swamp. The stench is thicker and more putrid than ever. With only the smallest streams of sunlight peaking through the tree line above, you can see large mudholes seeping out the gas, causing the stench. Vegetation is abnormally large and almost life like to the point of seeing some of the plants actually move in your direction.

Room.Name: Deep in the quagmire
Room.Description: You are now in the deepest part of the swamp. The stench is thicker and more putrid than ever. With only the smallest streams of sunlight peaking through the tree line above, you can see large mudholes seeping out the gas, causing the stench. Vegetation is abnormally large and almost life like to the point of seeing some of the plants actually move in your direction.

Vegetation is abnormally large and almost life like to the point of seeing some of the plants actually move in your direction.

Vegetation is abnormally large and almost life like to the point of seeing some of the plants actually move in your direction.

Vegetation is abnormally large and almost life like to the point of seeing some of the plants actually move in your direction.

With only the smallest streams of sunlight peaking through the tree line above, you can see large mudholes seeping out the gas, causing the stench. Vegetation is abnormally large and almost life like to the point of seeing some of the plants actually move in your direction.

Room.Description: You are now in the deepest part of the swamp. The stench is thicker and more putrid than ever. With only the smallest streams of sunlight peaking through the tree line above, you can see large mudholes seeping out the gas, causing the stench. Vegetation is abnormally large and almost life like to the point of seeing some of the plants actually move in your direction.

Room.Name: Deep in the quagmire
Room.Description: You are now in the deepest part of the swamp. The stench is thicker and more putrid than ever. With only the smallest streams of sunlight peaking through the tree line above, you can see large mudholes seeping out the gas, causing the stench. Vegetation is abnormally large and almost life like to the point of seeing some of the plants actually move in your direction.

Room.Name: Before a large tree
Room.Description: At this end of the swamp grows a large tree. You notice that all the other vegetation is quite a bit smaller by comparison to the immense size of this woody structure. Gazing up towards the sky, you can see that it's branches part their vegetation, allowing sunlight to pour through to the ground.

ExtraDescription.Description: After closer inspection, you can just make out the traces of a small door carved into the tree.

NPC.name: lizard scavenger
NPC.description: Walking around is what looks to be some sort of being, half man and half lizard. He is clad in of scaly leather armor and wielding a small spear.
NPC.longDescription: A large lizard-like man is walking around aimlessly, looking for something.

NPC.name: venus flytrap
NPC.description: Before you stands a very large example of a venus fly trap. Never have you seen such size in a one of these. Someone your size would make this plant a nice little snack.
NPC.longDescription: A large flower waits with open jaws to eat the next unlucky vicitm.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: marsh ghoul
NPC.description: Looking at this creature you can see that it is hungry and definitely unfriendly. I think its time to go somewhere else.
NPC.longDescription: A small creature of the swamp is looking for some flesh to feast on.

NPC.name: lizard man
NPC.description: A lizard man looks as if he is at home in this disgusting swamp. He casually looks around and suddenly decides to eat one of the flies buzzing in the air.
NPC.longDescription: A lizard man stands here before you wielding a large spear.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistRace

NPC.name: mosquito large
NPC.description: Before you is a mosquito, only a lot bigger than the ones you are used to seeing.
NPC.longDescription: A large mosquito buzzes around looking for someone to suck on.

NPC.name: giant mud turtle
NPC.description: A large turtle is here slowly moving in the mud, as if it were stuck.
NPC.longDescription: A large turtle is here half buried in the mud.

NPC.name: acid blob
NPC.description: A large blob of acidic jelly corrodes everything in its path. It's heading in your direction.
NPC.longDescription: A large blob of acidic jelly corrodes everything in its path.

NPC.name: wandering scientist
NPC.description: An older man is searching through the swamps seeking new things to study.
NPC.longDescription: An older man is searching through the swamps seeking new things to study.

NPC.name: mangy dog
NPC.description: A mangy dog has wandered away from civilization and into the marsh. He is covered in muck and stinks of sulfur.
NPC.longDescription: A mangy dog has wandered away from civilization into the marsh.

NPC.name: horace bandit
NPC.description: A man stands here dressed in swampy clothes and wielding a barbed dagger.
NPC.longDescription: A man stands here dressed in swampy clothes and wielding a barbed dagger.

NPC.name: dillard man
NPC.description: A small man no more than 4 feet tall is standing before you. With a gleam in his eye, he quickly unravels his whip and cracks it a few inches from your head.
NPC.longDescription: A small man with an evil gleam stands here cracking a whip.

NPC.name: damsel woman
NPC.description: A woman lies here helpless against the bonds that hold her. Whoever has done this does not want her to escape.
NPC.longDescription: A woman lies here helpless against the bonds that hold her.

NPC.name: slug
NPC.description: Before you is a large slug. Seeing such a sight you wish you had brought along a huge bag of salt.
NPC.longDescription: A large slug leaves a long trail of slime behind himself.

NPC.name: mound trash
NPC.description: A large mound of trash seems to be moving in your direction. This is quite odd.
NPC.longDescription: A large mound of trash seems to be moving in your direction.

NPC.name: shopkeeper man
NPC.description: A man dressed in swamp garb, surrounded by goods for sale, stands before you. He has used the locals to gather things from the swamp to create his goods to sale.
NPC.longDescription: A man dressed in swamp garb, surrounded by goods for sale, stands here.

NPC.name: snake moccasin water
NPC.description: A poisonous snake swims quickly through the swampy waters. It looks like it is coming in your direction.
NPC.longDescription: A poisonous snake swims quickly through the swampy waters.

NPC.name: leech
NPC.description: A leech about the size of a small baby is motionless on the ground before you. As soon as it senses your presence it starts to move about attempting to attach itself to you.
NPC.longDescription: A slimy leech is searching for a new host to feed on.

NPC.name: mangler
NPC.description: Before you is the most disturbing contraption you have ever seen. What was a huge iron furnace has now been corrupted with evil energies and artistic qualities, making the perfect killing machine.
NPC.longDescription: A large machine of destruction is here waiting to devour you, body and soul.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood DetectIllusion

Item.Name: iron spear
Item.LongDescription: An iron spear has been left on the ground.

Item.Name: scaly leather armor
Item.LongDescription: A set of scaly leather armor lies here on the ground.

Item.Name: corroded sword
Item.LongDescription: A sword corroded by digestive juices lies here on the ground.

Item.Name: walking stick
Item.LongDescription: A small stick covered in runes has been left on the ground.

Item.Name: transparent wings
Item.LongDescription: A pair of transparent wings is all that remains of a giant insect.

Item.Name: turtle shell
Item.LongDescription: The remainder of a large turtle lies here on the ground.

Item.Name: long white coat overcoat
Item.LongDescription: A long white overcoat has been left on the ground.

Item.Name: test tube
Item.LongDescription: A small glass test tube seems to have been misplaced.

Item.Name: magnifying glass
Item.LongDescription: A wooden handled magnifying glass has been dropped here.

Item.Name: broken leash
Item.LongDescription: A broken leather leash has been ripped off an animal's neck.

Item.Name: steel bowie knife
Item.LongDescription: A steel bowie knife has been left unattended.

Item.Name: barbed chain whip
Item.LongDescription: A long slender chain with steel barbs glows with evil energies.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Evil Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison Unholy

Item.Name: gold amulet
Item.LongDescription: A small chain with a gold amulet needs a new owner.

Item.Name: old axe
Item.LongDescription: An old axe lies here in a heap of garbage.

Item.Name: shoes
Item.LongDescription: A pair of old leather shoes are here covered in muck.

Item.Name: apple
Item.LongDescription: An old apple lies here half rotten.

Item.Name: carrot
Item.LongDescription: An old carrot lies here half rotten.

Item.Name: vial blood
Item.LongDescription: Amazingly enough you find a glass vial in the left over remains.

Item.Name: murky potion brown
Item.LongDescription: A murky brown potion is here on the ground.

Item.Name: crimson flask
Item.LongDescription: A flask filled with crimson liquid is for sale here.

Item.Name: sleeves pockets
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of sleeves with many pockets
Item.LongDescription: Some sleeves made of pure energy crackle on the ground.

Item.Name: violet potion
Item.LongDescription: A violet potion has been dropped by a salesman.
